m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Motors To Stop Supplying Mercedes-Benz With Battery Pack, Drivetrain As German Automaker Develops Its Own By Angelo Young @angeloyoung_ On 03/07/16 AT 5:08 PM The next generation Mercedes-Benz B-Class Electric Drive will forgo the battery pack and drivetrain that has underpinned Merc’s first fully electric vehicle. Pictured is a 2015 model. Photo: Mercedes-Benz After seven years, Mercedes-Benz and Tesla Motors are parting ways.
